channel.title: Connecting help
channel.description:
Hi Moparscapers.
Recently I decided to use my extremely old computer as a hosting computer for my server. It's windows 2000 (ooooh yeaah ;)) Anyway. I've Port forwarded corretly, duc is running and I have a host active. My server files are on the hosting computer and it even runs the source. Any Idea's as to why I can't connect to it on my normal computer?
(there is no problem with the internet, like it has good enough upload speed for 30-40 players) Any help would be appreciated.

item.title: Connecting help
item.dc:creator: @go_armand go armand
item.description:
@go_armand wrote:

Hi Moparscapers.

Recently I decided to use my extremely old computer as a hosting computer for my server. It’s windows 2000 (ooooh yeaah ;))
Anyway. I’ve Port forwarded corretly, duc is running and I have a host active. My server files are on the hosting computer and it even runs the source.
Any Idea’s as to why I can’t connect to it on my normal computer?

(there is no problem with the internet, like it has good enough upload speed for 30-40 players)
Any help would be appreciated.
